content.title: Great News: We‚Äôve Reduced Shipping Costs to Bring You Better Deals! üíôüì¶
content.creator:
TwoTrees
March 5, 2025
content.content:
Hey TwoTrees Backers,
A huge THANK YOU for your incredible support! We‚Äôve been closely following all your comments and feedback, and we truly appreciate every bit of it. International shipping, especially for a solid machine like the TTC-H40/H80, is no small feat, but we‚Äôre committed to making things easier for you. So, to show our gratitude and make things a little easier for you, we‚Äôve decided to cover part of the shipping costs, reducing rates by over 30%! üéâüì¶
We‚Äôve updated the shipping rates for many regions, and the savings are significant. If your country isn‚Äôt listed in the table, don‚Äôt worry‚Äîjust send us a message, and we‚Äôll work out the best solution for you. (The shipping estimates are calculated in USD.)
We explored several shipping options, including FedEx, but honestly, the prices were outrageous‚Äîalmost $1,600 to ship to the U.S.! Clearly, that wasn‚Äôt going to be a reasonable choice for most backers.
Here‚Äôs a breakdown using the TTC-H80 Advanced package as an example: 
‚úÖ Total weight (including machine & accessories): 80KG
‚úÖ Box dimensions: 238.5 √ó 43 √ó 30.5 cm
To bring costs down while ensuring safe and timely delivery, we‚Äôve opted for a sea freight + local distribution approach. Why?
‚úÖ Much lower overall shipping costs compared to express options like FedEx/DHL
‚úÖ Reduced taxes in some countries thanks to import processing at the warehouse
We know that every dollar counts, and we‚Äôre committed to making this campaign as accessible as possible. While we can‚Äôt eliminate shipping costs entirely, we‚Äôre doing everything we can to minimize the financial burden while ensuring your machine arrives safely and on time.
If you have any questions about shipping to your country, or if your country isn‚Äôt listed in our table, just reach out! We‚Äôll do our best to find a solution.
Once again, we can't thank you enough for your unwavering support, patience, and trust in us.
Cheers,
TwoTrees Team

comments.text: You legends! Thank you for the effort. Those cost were stopping alot of people being able to get your cnc
Thanks for all the effort you‚Äôre putting in, much appreciated!üòÉ

The new shipping charge is a welcome help. Plus it shows that TT is listening to backers. Thanks guys! Now, can we talk about ditching the 500w spindle for ppl that got the two higher options and have no need for the 500w? Food for thought...

Hi Kevin. Thank you for your support! We‚Äôve added the 20W laser module as an add-on option. If you‚Äôve backed the Premium package and plan to add the 20W laser, it‚Äôs actually more cost-effective to go for the Ultra package‚Äîyou‚Äôll get the 500W spindle included as an extra bonus.
The shipping cost is $259 Dollars ?????

Hi Johnny. Thank you for your support! To give you a clearer picture, let's take the TTC-H80 Advanced package as an example: ‚úÖ Total weight (including machine & accessories): 80KG ‚úÖ Box dimensions: 238.5 √ó 43 √ó 30.5 cm With this size and weight, shipping isn‚Äôt cheap. A direct FedEx quote exceeds $1600, and our initial shipping estimates were close to $350. The $259 rate you see is after our subsidy to help reduce the cost for backers. If we manage to secure a lower rate with another shipping provider, we‚Äôll be sure to update you!

content.title: Get Involved & Earn Rewards! üéâ 5% Cashback + Win CNC Bits!

content.content:
Hey Backers,
A big THANK YOU for all your support! üôè We‚Äôve received so many fantastic comments and suggestions, and we‚Äôre taking everything on board to make sure we‚Äôre giving you the best possible experience. üôå
Some of you mentioned wanting more ways to get involved, so we‚Äôve got two exciting opportunities to share with you.
1Ô∏è‚É£ SHARE TTC-H40 WITH FRIENDS & WIN 5% CASHBACK üí∏

Here‚Äôs how it works:

2Ô∏è‚É£ COMMENT & WIN üèÜ

comments.text: I'd like the big size of the working area!!
I was looking for something special and useful like this project!
Quello che cercavo, una CNC semplice, flessibile con un'area di lavoro ampia e con un prezzo accessibile. Penso mi dar√† grandi soddisfazioni.

is there an option to order some bits with the router for commen use and maybe some specific uses like thick wood or styrodur sheets (10 cm?) or at least a direction to know what kind of tools you need in the router

I was wondering if y‚Äôall could implement AI learning and precision into the software itself and also just maybe some kind of printing option where you could print it and engrave it and cut it and laser cut it. However you wanted to do maybe implement a six axis these are just suggestions. Thank you so much. I‚Äôm glad to back this project.

I have a small hobby cnc. I have wanted to expand to a larger quality cnc. Then the TTC-H40 popped up. I love the price. It was something that was somewhat holding me back. When I saw all the great features and work area, I was pretty much sold. My next concern was customer support. I researched the TwoTrees customer support and it was all good reports from customers. That was what pushed me forward to purchase this cnc over other cnc's. Features, quality, price, and after purchase customer support. I am definitely anxious to get started with this step up in my cnc experience. I'm sure there will be many others who feel as I do about this machine and Twotrees.

Could you link the pages where you found the positive feedback ? I am looking for ways to be reassured that everything is going to be ok as I found exactly the opposite to what you have found in my own research. Thank you !

I love how effortlessly you can swap tools on this machine. Switching from the spindle, or router to the laser. And I definitly will try to experiment with my own tools. Also, I was thinking about adding a bracket for a shopvac. Anyways,.. can't wait!

Two Tree ask why you buy our CNC TTC-H40, okay‚Ä¶ First, I‚Äòm was looking for a smaller CNC, but not too small. Second, I‚Äòm was l looking for a completly CNC, not a kit. Thirdly, I‚Äòm was looking for a good price-performance. I found onefinity, but hmm, for me and my claim and projects near to it‚Äòs expensiv. Also with the shipping cost to Europe. But they have a lot off Support‚Ä¶ Now I found the Two Trees TTC H40 For me the same good Design as onefinity. A bit smaller in material etc. But also smaller in Price and shippmend cost. For me and my need the best choice. Okey ttc hasen‚Äòt the big Community with help with Things and do. But it shine i‚Äôts a exciting CNC, so I‚Äòm thinking it‚Äòs sure to get a big Community for this wonderfull CNC! Big, but you can it dissamble in a small Package when not in use. Stable yet slim. Possibility to Chance Tools Like div. Router or Laser. I‚Äòm happy. Thank you TwoTrees!

Something about this machine convinced me. I think it is the construction and practical handling of the machine. And I believe that it‚Äôs efficiency in doing what it was made to do. I am happy to belong to the first buyers of this machine. Thanks Two Trees
Wishing I had the machine so as I could create. Patiently waiting but not patient ü•∫ please send me release dateüôè

content.title: We‚Äôre Fully Funded ‚Äì In Just 10 Minutes! üéâTHANK YOU!
content.creator:
TwoTrees
February 19, 2025
content.content:
Dear TwoTrees Backers,
Wow! We are absolutely blown away by your incredible support. Thanks to all of you, we reached 100% funding in just 10 minutes! üèÜ‚ú®
Over the past few hours, we‚Äôve received a flood of messages, questions, and suggestions from you. Many of you have expressed interest in additional accessories, and we hear you loud and clear! üëÇüëÄWe‚Äôre carefully reviewing all of your feedback and exploring ways to bring you more of what you need.üôåüí•
We‚Äôve also noticed the overwhelming curiosity about different aspects of the machine. From specifications to compatibility, we‚Äôre collecting all your questions and will be addressing them as soon as possible. Your engagement means everything to us, and we‚Äôre committed to keeping you updated every step of the way.üí™‚ú®
Thank you for making this launch such an amazing success.üí®üíØ
Stay tuned for more updates soon!
With gratitude,
TwoTrees Team

comments.text: Happy for full funding. How and When will we be able to get access to our New toy

Definitely excited about this project. Appreciating the feedback from other backers to understand possible limitations of the setup and need for additional options. Really appreciate efforts to keep transport costs down, I reckon I might own a big boat by now with shipping costs to Oz. Any chance Amazon can't be involved or are all your nuts already in the fire. Anyway jokes aside, keen to understand best cnc tooling and output control and compatibility for laser.
Congratulation on a successful launch. I can‚Äôt wait to get my H40 ultra and put it to work. Question does any of the included programs allow you to scan a picture and carve tahr image?
